What's Apex?

Apex Omni is one of the decentralized exchanges (DEX) that provides a platform for trading various cryptocurrencies.
The platform is known for its:

  • Decentralized trading with non-custodial wallets
  • Wide range of supported cryptocurrencies
  • Advanced trading features

API Key Setup Process

follow the steps below to configure your API Keys.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your API keys with anyone. Our platform uses industry-standard encryption to protect your credentials.' %}

1 Connect your wallet

  1. Go to Apex exchange by clicking on this link.
  2. Connect your wallet or sign up by clicking on the "Log in" button in the top-right corner.

2 Access API Management

  1. Click on your account in the top-right corner
  2. Select "API Management" from the dropdown menu

3 Generate API Key

  1. Click on "Generate API"
  2. Give your API key a name and leave the API type as default
  3. Enable "Restrict to Trusted IPs Only (Recommended)" option
  4. Add our server's IP address: {{ server_ip }}
  5. Click on "Confirm" to get your API key
  6. Make sure to copy your API Key, Secret and passphrase and store them in a safe place as you will need them to connect your Apex account to our platform.

4 Generate Omni key

  1. Click on "Omni Key"
    2. {% comment %}
  2. Click on "Understand"
    3. {% endcomment %}
  3. Click on "Next" to get your Omni key
  4. Make sure to copy your Omni Key and store it in a safe place as you will need it to connect your Apex account to our platform.

Complete Integration

Once you have your API keys and Omni key, return to our platform's Automate section and use them to link your Apex account with our automation system. This will enable automated trading based on your TradingView alerts.
